Registration

General infos

2nd round of registration will be open until 21st January at 24:00.

You can find the registration form at the bottom of this page.
Please read the terms and conditions below. Please note that, upon registration, you will be asked for personal details (such as name, surname, date of birth, university affiliation, etc.) and a motivational letter.

Terms

Please read carefully and take note of the following:

All personal data will be handled confidentiallyand in compliance with the European (GDPR EU 2016/679) and Italian (Art. 13 D. Lgs. 196/2003) data and privacy protection laws.
You accept the IAPS Code of Conduct.
PDF
Associazione Italiana Studenti di Fisica

The Associazione Italiana Studenti di Fisica (AISF) gathers together most of the Italian physics students. It was founded in Heidelberg in August 2014 and since January 2015 is a National Committee for the International Association of Physics Students (IAPS).
